data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Freyhof, Jörg, Kaya, Cüneyt, Bayçelebi, Esra, Geiger, Matthias, Turan, Davut (2018): Generic assignment of Leuciscus kurui Bogutskaya from the upper Tigris drainage, and a replacement name for Alburnus kurui Mangit & Yerli (Teleostei: Leuciscidae). Zootaxa 4410 (1): 113-135, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4410.1.6|9 occurrences
